basics.name: Jessica Zhu
basics.label: Game Developer
basics.summary: Dedicated game developer with a focus on building gameplay, seeking long-term position. Unreal(C++) and Unity(C#)

work.name: MSG Sphere
work.summary: Engineered multiple game genre prototypes (strategy, action, arcade) in Unreal Engine 5 that supported experiences for 10,000 simultaneous networked players

work.summary: Developed and maintained framework for creating user generated content

projects.name: Enstars KOR Efficiency Calculator Translator and Autopopulator

projects.name: Soulfarer
projects.summary: A mixed reality game for physical therapy. Soulfarer provides an immersive experience for patients to track improvements in an entertaining environment.  Joint Advanced Games Project between Rancho Los Amigos National Rehabilitation Center and USC School of Social Work.

projects.name: Terriblemon Pokedex
projects.summary: Pokedex for Pokemon Randomizers and Nuzlockes to keep track of information that differs from the original game. Includes for Type, Location, Moves, Abilities
